programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep386
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep33
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep304
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep20
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Di Mana Ada Kebaikan, Di Situ Ada Keajaiban
programme.desc: Emir seorang anak lelaki yang berbakti, tidak seperti kakaknya, yang selalu menyusahkan ibu mereka. Kakak Emir sudah berkahwin, tetapi hidupnya miskin. Suaminya seorang pakar hipnotis penipu. Adakah Emir dan ibunya dapat keluar dari masalah mereka?

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep387
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep39
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Kuis Teka Teki Ep6
programme.desc: Kuis Teka Teki juga dikenali sebagai Tebak Angka Tebas Rezeki adalah rancangan permainan, di mana orang meneka harga nominal untuk bahan makanan.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: The Sheriff In Town
programme.desc: When a former police investigator from Busan suspects something off about a slick businessman from Seoul, the “sheriff” resolves to track his every move in order to keep his town safe.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret Of The Lost Island
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective Kim Min attempts to track down the criminals responsible for circulating large amounts of counterfeit silver bullion while in search of the missing sibling of a young girl.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44744475

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep765766
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1751
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: Yin is a timid delivery boy who wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course and learns strange moves. Yin beats Black Bear to save Li while wearing a Garfield mask, but the credit is taken by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in a ring with his unique martial arts style.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student defect a cunning, malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the family business, over the game of mahjong.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter (Ti Lung) relives his violent past mistakes through a poverty-striken, streetwise kid, who severely injuries his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: An ambitious journalist eagerly pursues a long-forgotten accident. When the sole survivor of the accident suddenly disappears, he realizes that nothing is what it seems, and the unimaginable dark truth will haunt him for the rest of his life.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company which all staffs are women. Unfortunately, he is clueless with women so he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love Mona.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The "Venoms" were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one "venom" and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu school's students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke), Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the director's best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, "bloody good" entertainment!

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat’s knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit…

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: In this charming live-action adaptation of the beloved Old Master Q aka Mr Funny-bone, he and his sidekick, Mr. Potato get tangled in love when Mr Funny-bone falls head over heels in love with a dashing lady.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Hui picks up a purple shell and gives it to Ha as a momento. When her husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while he also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family…

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung’s brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Rivals Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Everyone wants to win the annual Lion Dance Trophy, including Wong Fei Hung. His jealous rivals, led by Master Shen, try to frame Wong by placing a decomposed corpse in his Po Chi Lam clinic. This gives Lu Wei, a corrupted cop, the chance to pile Wong Fei Hung with various criminal charges. Will Wong be able to defeat his enemies once again?

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical production showcases personable singer/actor George Lam, who tries to find love and success in the world of TV commercials along with his buddies Hamburger and Snoopy.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: Commissioner Liu Ta-hua (Tsao Ta-hua) is arrested by special envoy Cheng Chih-cheng (Wang Jung) for corruption. Coolie Lin Szu-hai (Gordon Liu Chia-hui), who has unintentionally helped Cheng, is given a small post under Lo. Lin is smart and soon learns how to get dockside bribes. Later, he gets a regular spin-off from Adjutant Chang…

programme.title: Raja Manthiri
programme.desc: Brothers Surya and Karthi always bicker over small issues from childhood. Things take an interesting turn when Surya's marriage is fixed with Subha, who is actually in love with Karthi.

programme.title: Aarumugam
programme.desc: Due to his hard work, Arumugam, a helpful poor man, becomes the richest man in his town. He sets out to exact revenge on Malini, a tycoon, for bulldozing his mother's grave and humiliating his sister.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Mannar Vagaiyara
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Balloon
programme.desc: Jeeva heads to a haunted house in Ooty where strange events start unfolding around him. The answer to which may lie in his past.

programme.title: Aan Devathai
programme.desc: Difficulties arise when Elango and Jessie, a married couple and parents of twins, decide to lead separate lives owing to an ugly fight.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Asuraguru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Cheranin Thirumanam
programme.desc: Mahesh and Aathira fall in love and tell their parents about their relationship. Though the families initially agree, they suddenly change their minds owing to the financial differences between them.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Kalavani 2
programme.desc: Arivazhagan files his candidature for the panchayat elections hoping to profit from the two competing parties, comprising of his uncle and his lady-love's father.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Meyadha Maan
programme.desc: A youngster who loves a girl tries to commit suicide and to dissuade him, his friend reaches out to the girl, setting in motion events that unexpectedly turn out to be life changing.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Thumbha
programme.desc: Two painters and a photographer try to stop a forest officer from poaching a tiger.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Marainthirunthu Paarkum Marmam Enna
programme.desc: A group of chain snatchers hatch an elaborate plan to carry out their operation. They target women and children but must ensure that they do not get caught.

programme.title: Republic
programme.desc: Republic

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep93
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep34
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep36
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep50
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep51
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep20
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep21
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep30
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep22
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep27
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep28
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep29
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep16
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep17

programme.desc: Welcome to the Housewarming - Dave and Gemma decide to invite the Butlers to their housewarming party. However, when everyone but Calvin accepts, Dave decides he's finally had enough of Calvin's refusal to welcome him to town.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise returns to his role as Ethan Hunt in the second installment of MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: It's the 23rd century and an alien power is evaporating the oceans. To save mankind, Kirk and his crew must time travel back to 1986 where they find a world as alien as anything they've ever encountered.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep18
programme.desc: American Dreams - Jess LaCroix and his team come to help OA find a fugitive LaCroix arrested years ago after a bus with 26 students goes missing and he's the main suspect, on the first part of a special two-part crossover

programme.title: The Mine
programme.desc: An ecocritical film that explores capitalistic greed and environmental destruction. A young civil servant, Jussi, is in charge of the environmental permit of a huge mine. He soon discovers dangerous truths about its operations but his job is on the line.

programme.title: The Broken Pencils
programme.desc: A hot-headed brother tries to help his younger brother with his math homework. Through the visual metaphor of broken pencils, the film hints at the dynamics underlying the brotherly relationship.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Top End Wedding
programme.desc: Newly engaged couple Lauren and Ned are excited to plan for their dream wedding. But there’s one big problem – Lauren’s mother has just vanished. They embark on an epic road trip across Northern Australia in search of her.

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

programme.title: The Coroner: A Leap Of Folly
programme.desc: A neurologist suddenly jumps off a bridge in front of his wife during a stroll. An autopsy shows that it was not suicide but a well-calibrated murder. With details still hazy, Alexander, the forensic pathologist, is pressured to come up with answers.

programme.title: Writings On The Wall
programme.desc: While digesting the abrupt death of his son, Ah Song seizes Arul, a 15-year-old vandal, at his doorstep, and drags the boy along on a journey to unravel the cause of his harassments.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: The Mine
programme.desc: An ecocritical film that explores capitalistic greed and environmental destruction. A young civil servant, Jussi, is in charge of the environmental permit of a huge mine. He soon discovers dangerous truths about its operations but his job is on the line.

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.

programme.title: Within The Whirlwind
programme.desc: A true story: Evegnia Ginzburg was a literature professor until the madness of Stalin’s Great Purge happened and landed her in a gulag. With the help of a loving camp doctor and poetry, she shows that one can possess dignity in the face of suffering.

programme.title: Writings On The Wall
programme.desc: While digesting the abrupt death of his son, Ah Song seizes Arul, a 15-year-old vandal, at his doorstep, and drags the boy along on a journey to unravel the cause of his harassments.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Dafne
programme.desc: Dafne is a witty and independent young woman with Down Syndrome. When her mother dies suddenly, her father, Luigi, tumbles into depression. Instead of Luigi as her caretaker, she takes charge and shakes her father up, helping both of them heal.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: The Coroner: A Leap Of Folly
programme.desc: A neurologist suddenly jumps off a bridge in front of his wife during a stroll. An autopsy shows that it was not suicide but a well-calibrated murder. With details still hazy, Alexander, the forensic pathologist, is pressured to come up with answers.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Kidz
programme.desc: Sara and Nicola are married and in love. Their lives seem to be perfect: they have an angelic six-year-old daughter, thriving careers and a stable marriage. The birth of their second child, which disrupts the family balance, leads to tragicomic scenarios.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Living Corpse
programme.desc: A woman’s corpse is found and sent for an autopsy. But before the procedure can begin, the woman “resurrects”! Alexandra, the forensic pathologist, secretly lodges with her while she tracks down the attacker. But before long, a second corpse appears.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Hermaphrodite
programme.desc: At the bottom of a cliff near Bordeaux, a corpse – composed of the bust of a white woman sewn to the legs of a black man – is found. Detectives Alex and Antoine know that the killer is making a sick statement but they struggle to decipher his motive.

programme.title: Within The Whirlwind
programme.desc: A true story: Evegnia Ginzburg was a literature professor until the madness of Stalin’s Great Purge happened and landed her in a gulag. With the help of a loving camp doctor and poetry, she shows that one can possess dignity in the face of suffering.

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Living Corpse
programme.desc: A woman’s corpse is found and sent for an autopsy. But before the procedure can begin, the woman “resurrects”! Alexandra, the forensic pathologist, secretly lodges with her while she tracks down the attacker. But before long, a second corpse appears.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Hermaphrodite
programme.desc: At the bottom of a cliff near Bordeaux, a corpse – composed of the bust of a white woman sewn to the legs of a black man – is found. Detectives Alex and Antoine know that the killer is making a sick statement but they struggle to decipher his motive.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagros’s happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wife’s growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Survivor
programme.desc: The body of a woman in her fifties is found in a forest but autopsy results reveal musculature that is incompatible with her age group and ritual-like post mortal evidence. Detective Antoine looks back to her extraordinarily childhood for clues.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep172
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: After School Club is the Live Music Request show for K-Pop fans all around the world. On our weekly live show, you can join our video chat sessions through Google Hangouts, send us tweets, and share status. Also, ASC presents the K-POP stars' record storehouse! The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: Issues & Insiders Ep2
programme.desc: In-depth analysis of various domestic and foreign issues surrounding Korea with experts in each field

programme.title: K-Biz, Scaling Up Tech Startups Ep24
programme.desc: Innovative startups for future growth. Targeting the global market with innovative technologies. Small, but competitive businesses in Korea. The revenues of small businesses have dropped due to the COVID-19 pandemic, and it is time to prepare proper measures to support small businesses.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep172
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Smes On The Rise 2022 Ep4
programme.desc: [SMEs on the rise] introduces advanced technologies of the small and mid-sized enterprises located in Suwon City, which is the capital of Gyeonggi-do Province. And we suggest a blueprint for the future of the Korean economy.

programme.title: Premium Collection A Ep4
programme.desc: Arirang TV's premium documentary series, Premium Collection

programme.title: News In-Depth Ep2
programme.desc: Prime news with experts’ interview covering various issues including economy, politics, sports, culture, etc.

programme.title: Smartbiz Accelerators 2 Ep159
programme.desc: SmartBiz Accelerators introduces a variety of domestic small and medium-sized companies that have achieved continuous growth based on the smart factory project provided by Samsung Electronics as well as gives information on the technological competitiveness and the outlook for the companies in the global market.

programme.title: Diplomat Talks Ep104
programme.desc: Diplomats residing in South Korea have prepared special stories to share and have extended their invitations to viewers around the world. Through in-depth conversations with ambassadors who are at the center of global discussions, viewers can learn about near, but far neighboring countries, as well as the rest of the multicultural nations co-existing on our planet. "Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.title: Bizsmart With Smes Ep8
programme.desc: BizSmart introduces a lot of small and medium-sized businesses in Korea and their products, as part of an effort to support the growth of those companies. programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Group A Semi-Final - The final four Group A singers compete in the semifinals and two are eliminated; guest panellist will.i.am.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Such Sweet Sorrow - When the U.S.S. Discovery’s crucial mission does not go according to plan, Burnham realizes what must ultimately be done. The crew prepares for the battle of a lifetime as Leland’s Control ships get closer.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S24 Ep3
programme.desc: The Mirror Effect - In the criminal justice system, sexually based crimes are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of the Special Victims Unit.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep17
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep1

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep13
programme.desc: Child's Play / Haunted Highway - Officer John Hulton is dispatched to a fatal car accident involving a small child. Officer Joseph Warner patrols a highway where multiple fatalities happen mysteriously every year.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Uninvited House Guest / Perimeter Breach / Asylum Attack - Police Officer Jennifer gets a 911 call for a violent home invasion. Military security officer Dan met a woman in distress while at work. Paramedic Ryleigh was called to transport a patient from a boys' psychiatric home.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Backyard Hanging / Dr. Dead / The Mist - A man calls 911 because he thinks he see someone hanging from a tree. Officer joe answers a 911 call of an intruder call at a convalescent home. Officer Jim is dispatched when a call comes in for an abandoned vehicle.

programme.desc: Fix Our Climate - Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and Christiana Figueres, the inspirational diplomat who led negotiations for the Paris Agreement on climate change, highlight inspiring and often unexpected solutions to the climate challenge. programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 2 - Join Ryan and his team as they continue the mammoth trek that began in Vaduz, Liechtenstein, meeting a fascinating collection of characters along their path, as they draw ever closer to their goal of arriving in Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Starting in the Nevada desert, to the brutal North Sea. We see the origins of Tesla batteries, Yamaha grand pianos, Siemens Gamesa wind turbine blades and Sandvik's boring bar.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Philippines - Robson visits some of the 7000 islands of the Philippines, and although it is a paradise the local fish are powerful, aggressive and stubborn.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Water Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Cocos Island Ep1
programme.desc: Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, we’ll explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - The Dune Kingdoms Ep1
programme.desc: Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bonaire National Marine Park Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Ocean Oddballs Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into the lives of the ocean’s weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fish’s eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail Ep2
programme.desc: The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Cape Fur Seals Ep2
programme.desc: On South Africa’s west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that can’t swim, it’s a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary Ep2
programme.desc: This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists’ efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Chasing Mako Ep3
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators – before it’s too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - How Smart Are Sharks? Ep4
programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Palau Shark Sanctuary Ep2
programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the world’s first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the world’s largest marine sanctuary – a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1

programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the world’s first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the world’s largest marine sanctuary – a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect Ep3
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks Ep3
programme.desc: The Bahamas is known as the “underwater movie capital of the world”. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Mafia Island - Uncharted Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary Ep3
programme.desc: On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Costa Rica - Shark Defenders Ep8
programme.desc: The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.desc: TechStorm Originals explores the latest upcoming gadgets, app reviews, interviews with tech startups and the hottest news from the tech and Esports scenes.

programme.title: Forging The Future Ep6
programme.desc: Life Off Earth - When we thought The Space Race peaked with the Apollo missions, the New Space Race in getting humans to Mars is heating up. This episode presents the visionaries who are making this future possible.

programme.title: Dota 2 ESL Ep9
programme.desc: In this one of the world's premiere esports tournaments, witness the history being written once again while the most popular names in the ESports industry are competing against each other with DOTA 2.

programme.desc: Beehives - Host Mo Rocca shows us: The motorized surfboard fin. A super absorbent sponge to keep construction going after rainstorms. Glasses that monitor your health.

programme.desc: Eat Cleaner - Mareya has created an all-natural fruit and vegetable spray wash that helps prolong produce shelf life. She's seeking support from our investors to turn her product into a household name.

programme.title: Hatched (S2) Ep2
