programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep6
programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cereal / Tiny Danger - The Harvey street kids set out to solve the mystery of who stole their one of a kind cereal! Lotta fights back when Tiny is told that he’s too small to race in a bike race.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mountain Mayhem / Gator Spinner Max - After winning a citizen swap contest, Archibald moves to a mountain town for a week. Archibald finds a practical use for his pal's wacky invention.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison In The Pit Of The Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep7
programme.desc: Team Building - Ceo, Akila, and Brian must demonstrate they make a great team so Khepra doesn’t split them up.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap To The Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Squishy Predicament Of Stanley Peet’S Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep6
programme.desc: Black Hole/ Winston Churchill - Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a Black Hole after skipping their chores; Winston Churchill runs away to hide in a baby nursery to avoid work.

programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep6
programme.desc: Win, Lose Or Draal - Everything comes into perspective when Jim discovers his re-match with Draal is to the death.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Rupert And The Rainbow - It's a colourful Nutwood when Rupert and Ping Pong try to use the Rainbow to paint pictures with.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Rupert And The Toy Soldiers - When Ping Pong's spell to fix a broken toy Soldier goes wrong Rupert and his friends need help from an unexpected source to get him back in the box.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Super Paul - Dennis persuades Pieface that Paul is an undercover super hero! Gnasher, JJ and Rubi must go along with the story and help Dennis to 'prove it'. However, his genius plan comes to a sticky end, when Pieface begins to think that with Paul at his side, he is completely invincible!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Wonder Sausage - Wonder Sausage The world famous Wonder Sausage is on show in Butch Butcher's shop. Walter realises the sausage has a strange hypnotic effect on Gnasher so uses it to make him follow his every whim! Dennis can't understand why Gnasher has turned against him and has to use all his heartfelt pleas and happy memories to try and win Gnasher back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep8
programme.desc: Taking Flight - Team Voltron responds to a distress call and stops to help a stranded band of freedom fighters on the run from Zarkon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep8
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter Three - A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino-Can-Do / Big Bad Bug - Crackridge's new resident dinosaur has a hard time fitting in. Archibald and a new friend attempt to conquer their fear of the basement.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Costly Conundrum Of The Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble In Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep7
programme.desc: The Gray Matter / Fever Break - Oh and Tip discover an underground cult living in the sewers./While Tip is home with a fever, she witnesses a crime committed by her scheming neighbor, Donny.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep39
programme.desc: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue - You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticker Mystery - New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the ‘sticker bandit” – a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stolen Treasure - The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isn't Tina the Terrible's galleon at all. It's the shadow of a toy ship! He works out that Pirate Stripes took the treasure so that they could go on a treasure hunt to look for it! Pirate Stripes apologises for taking the treasure and returns it. Pirate Captain tells her that they've had such fun hunting for the treasure that they should do it again! Well done, Noddy. You've saved the day!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, “What shall we have for our harvest breakfast?” That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. “What about something chewy” suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry – until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear – the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Campfire Weekend / Girls Just Wanna Save Fun - When the girls can’t go to camp they create their very own on Harvey street. The story of how Audrey, Dot and Lotta first became the Harvey Girls.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep18
programme.desc: Two'S Company - Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save a Runaway Stargazer - A comet is coming and the Paw Patrol get to work building a giant observatory! When the observatory starts rolling out-of-control Rubble and the pups need to get to work re-building everything it's destroyed in this Ultimate Construction Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Stop a Meltdown / Ultimate Rescue: Pups and the Mystery of the Missing Cellphones - It's a hot day in Adventure Bay and things are melting! The pups will need afire-pup power to cool things down. // Cell phones are vanishing all over adventure bay! The pups will need a lot of police power to solve this mystery and save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Mountain Climbers / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save Captain Gordy - Rubble leads the pups in building an emergency landing pad for Captain Gordy in this Ultimate Construction Rescue! // Mayor Goodway, Danny and the Turbots are stuck in a canyon. It's time for a high-flying Ultimate Rescue lead by Skye!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games - Marshall leads the pups when an underground fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies in this Ultimate Fire Rescue. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games in this Ultimate Police Rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Pupmobiles - Mayor Goodway honors the Paw Patrol with the Key to the City. But Sid Swashbuckle and his trusty pirate pup Arrby swipe the key. Ryder calls for an Ultimate Rescue as the pups team up, Police style, to solve the mystery and stop those pesky pirates.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Rig Rescue: Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control. It's up to the pups to save the day

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719

programme.desc: Pups Save a Magic Trick - When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep66
programme.desc: Not Enough Room - The Teletubbies are about to go on the Tubby Custard Ride with the hat, bag, ball and scooter when they realise there is not enough room. The Noo-Noo looks after their things.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Cat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! There's a black cat, a white cat, a kitten cat and a purring cat, as well as a very cool cat!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: The Wind In Her Sails - Sailor Po can't sail her yacht unless Team Tinpo can find some wind for her sails.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: It's time to build a den - JoJo and Gran Gran see Cynthia building a new greenhouse and decide to build a den. But when the den is too small both of them to fit in, Gran Gran helps JoJo to build a bigger den.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Sabre-Toothed Cat & Roar - Andy leaps into his time-travelling clock to visit a fearsome sabre-toothed cat, but when his gizmo malfunctions he is accidentally shrunk down to the size of an insect.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Amazing Motorbikes - Grace rides a classic touring bike, then shows off futuristic self-balancing bikes before heading to an indoor motocross course to ride an electric dirt bike.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep6
programme.desc: Sandy's Waistcoat of Wonders - Sandy claims he can pull absolutely anything from of his waistcoat of wonders, so Captain Captain and Seaweed put him to the test. But Sandy decides there's only one way to properly convince them - with a song!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hailstorm - Can the Go Jetters brand new click-on save the GoJet Academy from a glitched thunderstorm?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: Seattle Space Needle, USA - The team goes where no Go Jetter has gone before, when Glitch tries to launch into space.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep5
programme.desc: Charlie and Eddie - Edward wants to show Charlie that he is a really fun engine instead of doing his job.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: Hair Cut - Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Old Toys - Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Farmer Christmas - Nelly and Nora see a man with a white beard and a red coat. Could it be...

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: I Can't Stop Hiccuping - Lola and Lotta are practising their song for the school concert, but when Lola gets a fit of the hiccups she worries they'll never go away.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Scary - Tony runs into a cave where a scary thing lives. Can Gwen and Bob out-scare it and get him back?

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Thing That Talked Back - Bob and Tony lose Gwen in a canyon that makes their voices echo - how will they find her?

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep51

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep18

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.desc: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues - The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Absent Minded / Be Stella My Heart - Clyde discovers he didn't earn junior administrator job. But can he give up the perks that come along with it? // When the new girl starts hanging around Lincoln and his friends, they begin to suspect she likes one of them.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.desc: Ponopoly / President Annie - Annie worries her game night will be too boring, until Pony whips out his custom game, Ponopoly Plus. // The apartment building president tries to keep Annie and Pony from riding the elevator, so Annie decides she'll run for president against her.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Annie's Voice / Business as Usual - When Annie loses her voice rehearsing her song for Winter Fest, Pony offers to speak for her so she can get it back in time. // When Annie and Pony lose Dog, Pony has to take his place and fool Mrs. Okaba until Annie can get him back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep76
programme.desc: The Thing / Hocus Pocus - After a bike accident, Squidward is coated in so much mud that the residents of Bikini Bottom think he is a monster. // SpongeBob tries to impress Squidward with his new magic kit.

programme.desc: Driven To Tears / Rule of Dumb - SpongeBob has failed his driving test - again. Pat is so outraged that he takes the test to prove that it is unfair, only he passes! // Patrick discovers in a genealogy document that he is next in line to receive a kingly title!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep78
programme.desc: Born To Be Wild / Best Frenemies - SpongeBob hears that a ferocious biker gang is coming to town, so SpongeBob prepares to protect the town all by himself. // A new Kelp Smoothy chain is opening up all over Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep79
programme.desc: The Pink Purloiner / Squid Wood - SpongeBob's favorite jellyfishing net is missing! And worst of all, Pat may have been the one that stole it. // Rejected yet again by Squidward, SpongeBob decides that if he can't hang with the real Squid, he'll make his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Terror Cotta - Fung finds an old scroll with instructions for making living terra cotta warriors, and soon it's up to Po and the Five to stop his monstrous clay creation.

programme.desc: The Spirit Orbs of Master Ding - When Po is possessed by the ghost of evil Master Ding, it's up to Tigress to save him before Ding can unleash his powers and enslave the Valley of Peace.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Lake Laogai - While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet, but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.

programme.desc: What Goes Around - A little girl loses her doll at the zoo, and Rico gives up his own doll to replace it. Private assures Rico that his good deed will come back to him.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Night and Dazed / The Big Squeeze - The penguins accidentally launch Leonard the Koala out of the zoo and into midtown Manhattan. // When all the little mammals in the zoo start to disappear the penguins suspect the new boa constrictor, Salvio.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Can't Touch This / Hard Boiled Eggy - The penguins discover the abuse that Randy the sheep gets in the children's zoo from all the children tugging at his wool, and decide to find him a new home. // The duckling Eggy is back. The training that the penguins gave him worked.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Introducktions / Fowl Feud - SwaySway and Buhdeuce head deep into the bread mines to introduce their number one customer to the Bread Maker! // After breaking each other's favorite possessions, they get into a feud and might just part ways FOREVER!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Kendar decides to give Axe to Alivn the demon so Alvin will leave them all alone. Brendar and the gang are devastated and decide to go on a quest to rescue Axe.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Dorg and the Birthday Boy / Dorg Gets the Perfect Gift - Jet has some odd symptoms on his birthday, like rainbow zits. Patronella realizes they're signs of the Great Change-he's turning into a rainbow! // On Mother's Day Dorg gives his Mom a luxurious coat...which is actually RD.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep104
programme.desc: It Takes Two To Talent / Pot Luck - Felicity can't decide what to do for the Mythlandia Talent Contest while Miguel channels his guitar skills. // Felicity creates a rainbow, causing a leprechaun named Paddy to appear.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Day of the Snake / Prickerbeast - Sanjay discovers all the awesome things Craig does when Sanjay's at school. // The kids discover a local legend is a lie and get revenge on their parents.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep105
programme.desc: I, Fanbot / Berry Sick - Desperate not to fail a test, Fanboy decides to switch brains with a robot. // During a summer heat wave, the boys discover the Frosty Freeze machine is on the fritz.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Toast of T.U.F.F. / Share A Lair - Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster capable of doing much more than making perfect toast. // T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share their HQs after destroying each other’s headquarters.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep623
programme.desc: The Anthem - Even without her voice, Musa uses music to save Alfea from the witches. But now the Winx must choose between Musa's voice and the Legendarium key, which Rumpelstiltskin has offered to accept in exchange. Will they strike a deal?

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Legendary Duel - When the Trix challenge Bloom to a one-on-one duel with Selina, it is up to the Winx to provide backup. But when Selina unleashes the mighty, yet dangerous, champions of Alfea, all rules go out the window.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Turtle-dega Nights: The Ballad of Rat Man / The Ancient Art of Ninja Hide and Seek - A day with Dad leads to Splinter entering the Turtle Tank in a demolition derby. // Splinter struggles as both a parent and a sensei when he teaches his sons the Art of Ninja Concealment.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep169
programme.desc: Are You Happy Now? / Planet of the Jellyfish - When Squidward can’t recall his happiest memory, SpongeBob “helps” him create one. // When an evil Jellien overlord replaces everyone in Bikini Bottom with clones, it’s up to SpongeBob and Sandy to defeat him!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Crystal Ball Birthday - Annie and Amber offer to plan Brittany's birthday party, pitting her against Jeanette and Eleanor in the process.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: The Crush - Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Fool's Paradise / Job Insecurity - With prankster Luan at camp for April Fool's Day, the Louds think they're safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel. // The kids discover Dad isn't at his IT job anymore and is now a dishwasher.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: Special Program
programme.desc: How US corporations try to stop a resurgence of labor unions - Are we seeing the US labor rights movement’s David and Goliath moment? A rising wave of social inequality, brought into stark relief by crises like the COVID-19 pandemic, has pushed workers for megacorporations around the world to campaign for more rights. We look at how the global labor landscape is changing, especially in the United States, as more workers move to unionize.
